page.title: 10The Beach in Voe.
page.content: Voe is teeming with wildlife.The hills,burn,fields,sea and beach all provide ideal habitats for many creatures. The beach in Voe is a pebbly and stony one.It is an ideal place for a walk as there is so much to see. The beach itself is littered with an assortment of shells;periwinkles, razor shells,mussels etc.Many kinds of seaweed can also be found. Sandhoppers and sea slaters swarm under the rocks. Flowers such as the tormentils and violets grow on the grassy bank above the beach. Binoculars would give a close up view of the many coastline birds which can be spotted from the beach. Just off from the beach are three mussel rafts.
